item.title: About
item.description: About Us Our engineer Carter Konz is a musician, audio-geek, and software developer. He recieved a degree in Computer Science from Loyola University Chicago in 2017, where he had the opportunity to practice audio engineering in conjunction with formal Computer Science training. A strong background with computers and technology provides him a unique, workflow-driven, audio engineering skill set. In addition to a creative and musical ear, Carter's technical training has enabled him to develop a reliable, streamlined engineering workflow that eliminates technical issues so that your music can come first.
